specials_info: Coffin -> If you open it -> Battle [1 Vampire Lord]
Two sleeping dragons awake -> Battle [1 Red Dragon, 1 Red Dragon]
Magic Mouth Riddle: "Name the greatest son of Odin and win his aid" -> Answer: THOR -> Item: "Thor Fgn"
When you step on this square, each door turns into a wall and each wall into a door, thus allowing you to progress to the stairs.
